organization.card-description: You can invite other users to join your organization later through the organization settings.
organization.logo-must-be-url: Logo must be a valid URL.
organization.name-max-length: Your organization name must be at most 255 characters long.
organization.name-min-length: Your organization name must be at least 3 characters long.
organization.organization-name-description: Please enter the name of your organization.
organization.title: Organization

user-account.avatar-must-be-url: Avatar must be a valid URL.
user-account.card-description: Welcome to the React Router SaaS template! Please create your user account to get started.
user-account.name-max-length: Your name must be at most 128 characters long.
user-account.name-min-length: Your name must be at least 2 characters long.
user-account.title: User account
user-account.user-name-description: Please enter your full name for public display within your organization.
